name: King Must Survive
description:
In the enchanted world of the Middle Ages, it's a king's struggle for survival! Equipped with top-down shooter mechanics and rogue-lite elements, you must battle against increasingly challenging waves of enemy swarms.

You'll encounter different maps and various foes, engaging in a great struggle. Your chosen abilities will determine your style of combat and fate.

Features
- Automatic firing weapons and spells are available.
- Games are short-lived, lasting less than 10 minutes.
- You can choose from 4 different characters, each with unique attributes.
- There are 9 item and ability options.
- Try to survive during waves lasting 10 minutes and eliminate as many enemies as possible.
- Gain experience points by destroying enemies. Level up to choose your own special abilities between attacks!
- As the level increases, the difficulty levels of the enemies will also increase.
